content: :) It started very differently. I snapped the picture a couple of weeks back when I went to visit my dad — the day before our 24th wedding anniversary. I did get married there. I promised to honor, serve and -gasp-obey in that church. I’ll never live that down with my husband.:) I began writing about the wedding, but it wasn’t flowing right. I started thinking about memories from the church. Hesitated in the hearse part — but, death is a part of life. I always enjoyed the organ. How are your flowers coming up? Do I remember correctly — you added a lot of perennials last fall?
